contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heading: Sakhnini Market - Fruits & Vegetables
contact.intro: At 'Sakhnini Market', we pride ourselves on offering organic and fresh fruits and vegetables delivered directly to your doorstep, with a focus on quality and excellent service.
contact.goal: Our goal is to provide our customers with the healthiest fruits and vegetables while adhering to organic and sustainable farming principles. Join us for a healthy and delicious lifestyle.
contact.team: Get in Touch with the Sakhnini Market Team
contact.teamDesc: Our team is skilled and dedicated, always ready to help and answer any inquiries. Whether you want to learn more about our products, place an order, or discuss anything else ‚Äì we are here for you.
contact.note: We always welcome your inquiries. Our team works hard to ensure you receive the best service. Feel free to contact us anytime.
contact.address: If you wish to visit us in person, we are located at: Umm al-Fahm, Market Street
contact.thanks: Thank you for choosing us ‚Äì we are happy to help you enjoy healthy, quality food!

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: In our Corner Market app, we respect your privacy and understand the importance of protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information, including when you log in using Google.

collectedInfo.title: What Information Do We Collect?
collectedInfo.text: When logging in via Google, we obtain the following information from your account:

info.name: First and last name ‚Äì as specified in your Google profile.
info.email: Email ‚Äì your address used for registration.
info.image: Profile picture ‚Äì if available, it will be displayed in your profile inside the app.

collectedInfo.technical: Additionally, we may store technical information such as IP address, browser type, and operating system for security and service improvement purposes.

usage.title: How Do We Use the Information?

points.p1: To register the user and verify identity.
points.p2: To improve the in-app user experience.
points.p3: To send notifications, updates, or relevant reminders.
points.p4: To protect the system and secure your account.

consent.title: Transparency & Consent
consent.text: When logging in via Google, you will be asked to consent to sharing your information. We request only the necessary permissions to operate the service, with full transparency.

points.external: External services: Information is transferred only to providers necessary for app operation.
points.law: Legal compliance: We share information only if legally required.

protection.title: Information Protection
protection.text: We take advanced technical and organizational measures to protect your information. However, no protection is absolute, so we recommend not sharing passwords and choosing a strong password.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.text: This policy may be amended from time to time. We will notify you in-app or via direct notification. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the changes.

points.p1: The right to access personal information stored about you.
points.p2: The right to correct incorrect or incomplete information.
points.p3: The right to request deletion of information ‚Äì as long as there is no legal obligation to retain it.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.text: For any inquiry or request regarding privacy, you can contact via phone:

userConsent.title: User Consent
userConsent.text: By using the app, you agree that you have read, understood, and accepted this privacy policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.

footer.descriptionC2C: Buy and sell directly with other users easily and safely.

removeAccount.heading: Delete Account
removeAccount.description: If you delete your account, this action cannot be undone
